page.title: 19Kington St Michael Shops
page.content: In Kington St.Michael we have two shops. One is a{Post Office}which also sells stationery and small toys. In the food line you can also buy most items there, including sweets. From the outside you would not think it was a Post Office, because it is just a room in a house. The{opening times}are Mon, Tues, Thurs, Fri: 9.00-17.30 (lunch 12.30- 14.00). Wed,Sat: 9.00-12.30. Sun: Shut. The{SPAR shop}has a big glass front, with a corrugated iron roof. This shop is next to the Club, and nearly opposite the almshouses. Here they sell mainly food, including meat and dairy products. They also sell cigarettes, sweets and cards. The opening times are: Mon-Fri: 8.30-17.30 (lunch 13.00-14.00). Sat: 9.00-13.00. Sun: Shut.
